title: World War Two: the challenge of commemoration
itunes:title: World War Two: the challenge of commemoration
itunes:subtitle: Keith Lowe speaks to us about his new book on monuments to the Second World War and explains why many have become highly controversial. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian and author Keith Lowe speaks to us about his new book Prisoners of History, which tells the stories of 25 monuments to the Second World War from across the globe and explains why many have become highly controversial. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
